Building long term relationships with our customers and deepens the understanding of our customers' financial needs and provides professional suggestions.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Personal Banker/New Accounts Representative - Monday - Friday Only, No Saturdays

Location: St Louis, MO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
Triad Bank is a full-service financial institution established in 2005 with a mission to provide a wide range of commercial and personal banking services to closely held businesses, their owners and families. Our relationship-based approach gives our valued clients the comfort of knowing all of their banking needs will be satisfied by a locally owned financial institution that provides creative solutions, exceptional service and a quick turn-around for any financial need.

Triad Bank is looking to hire a Personal Banker.

This is a fulltime position, Monday thru Friday 8am to 5pm. No Saturdays!

Qualifications

1-2 years of recent banking experience requiredMust possess excellent customer service skillsPresent a professional imageKnowledge of safe deposit admissionsCommunicate and cooperate with others (internal and external) to produce needed outcomes and meet goals.Skillful at establishing priorities and channeling efforts productivelyDemonstrate flexibility, versatility, commitment, and good judgmentAbility to be well organized in an environment of diverse responsibilitiesOperate a personal computer and appropriate software packages

Primary Job Duties

Understand all Bank Deposit ProductsAnswer incoming phone calls.Assist customers with specific requests, including but not limited to:Stop PaymentsOnline banking - setting up, unlocking, Bill Pay and Message Center requests. Account Questions TransfersWiresAddress ChangesCheck OrdersStatementsNotaryCashier's checksDebit Cards

Opening/Closing accounts:Personal and Business Checking and Money MarketsPersonal SavingsCD'sSafe Deposit BoxesTeller, New Account, Loan checkbackScanning documentation for accounts into databaseAssist officers with requests - including but not limited to: Customer Service and New AccountsFraud
Secondary Job Duties

Back up TellerMaintain and balance own teller drawer.Assist with customer needs - cashing checks, deposits, cashier's checks, SDB admissionsAs neededNight Drop, Bank by MailScan Teller WorkAssist with Balancing the Vault and ATMReceptionist Duties:Greet CustomersOrder SuppliesMail:Organize and distribute.Arrange for courier service, as needed.Deliver dropped off paperwork.Keep postage machine balance.In addition, any request deemed necessary by the Lobby Manager to assist with the department.
We offer a competitive salary as well as a wide range of benefits including but not limited to:

401(k)Disability insuranceFlexible spending accountHealth insurance, PPO and HSALife insuranceLong Term DisabilityShort Term DisabilityTuition ReimbursementVision insuranceDental Insuraance

APPLY TODAY!

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
